markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with [Huana](/huana/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | next = Bounty - Oheiro | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Huana_01 | guid = 0aee204d-52bb-44fa-8712-5bf0522e25dd }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Barati has tasked the Watcher with hunting down [Diccila](/diccila/), a Vailian captain who commands the voyager [Alisio](/alisio/). There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Diccila commands the voyager [The Alisio](/theAlisio/). She's often found in the waters south of [Neketaka](/neketaka/), circling around the [Oathbinder's Sanctum](/oathbindersSanctum/) island in the [Karatapu Channel](/karatapuChannel/), then returning to the capital. ## Notes * Categorized as a Huana faction quest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Huana_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Diccila''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Barati has tasked me with hunting down Diccila, a Vailian captain who commands the voyager Alisio. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Diccila and take her ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Diccila commands the voyager Alisio. She's often found in the waters south of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Barati.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Diccila is no more and Barati will reward me for proof of the deed. He can be found on the upper floor of the palace in Serpent's Crown in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Diccila and claimed the reward for her bounty. |}
